name: Die for Me
description:
You are a necromancer, a master of undeath that seeks immortality through lichdom. Organize your followers to manage your outpost, generate dark magic, and defend against human incursion and wild beasts. Will your followers live up to your aspirations, or will you succumb to a fate worse than death?

Notes: The events and mechanics are not particularly well balanced. This may be less of a game and more of a juicy tech demo.

Attribution: Music is Unholy Knight, Malicious, Eternal Terminal, and Crowd Hammer by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com). Die rolling sound effect is dice_06.wav from freesound.com. The main background and mission backgrounds are from unsplash.com, and all in-game icons were generated with game-icons.net.
